FAQ

Why a wiki? Why not just a shared Google Drive folder?

Structure, consistency, flexibility, and community ownership.

Why DokuWiki? Why not something prettier like a Fandom site?

DokuWiki is open-source, saves pages as plain text files (no database required, easy to archive), has been around for a long time, and has an extensive collection of plugins to extend functionality. The tagging system is a little clunky (hopefully this will be addressed by a plugin update), but as you'll hopefully see on the Repertoire page, it makes it much easier to find music that fits the needs of your specific group.
